cmd='/usr/bin/cmake;-GUnix Makefiles;-DCMAKE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE=TRUE;-DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON;-DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=/usr/bin/c++;-DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_LAUNCHER=;-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS=;-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG=-g;-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE=-O3 -DNDEBUG;-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO=-O2 -g -DNDEBUG;-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_MINSIZEREL=-Os -DNDEBUG;-GUnix Makefiles;<SOURCE_DIR><SOURCE_SUBDIR>'
